original_text: So whoever belongs to the Son has this true life. But anyone who does not belong to the Son of God does not have this true life.
korean_text: 아들이 있는 자에게는 생명이 있고 하나님의 아들이 없는 자에게는 생명이 없느니라

sentences.original_text: So whoever belongs to the Son
But anyone who does not belong to the Son of God
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님의 아들에게 속하지 않는 사람은

sentences.original_text: does not have this true life
